products.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Retro High
products.description: The iconic Air Jordan 1 Retro High brings back the classic design that started it all. Premium leather upper with the signature Wings logo and Air-Sole unit for comfort.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
products.description: Experience incredible energy return with every step. The Ultraboost 22 features responsive BOOST midsole and Primeknit upper for ultimate comfort.

products.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
products.description: The timeless classic that never goes out of style. Canvas upper with rubber toe cap and signature All Star patch.

products.name: Vans Old Skool
products.description: The classic skate shoe with the iconic side stripe. Durable canvas and suede upper with signature waffle outsole.

products.name: Dr. Martens 1460 Boots
products.description: The original Dr. Martens boot. Built to last with smooth leather upper and the famous air-cushioned sole.

products.name: New Balance 990v5
products.description: Made in USA premium running shoe with ENCAP midsole technology and pigskin/mesh upper for superior comfort.

products.name: Nike Dunk Low Retro
products.description: Low-cut, everyday classic with durable overlays and a padded collar for comfort. Clean color-blocking inspired by the original releases.

products.name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
products.description: The legend lives on with classic AF1 style: crisp leather, bold details, and a comfortable Air-Sole unit built for all-day wear.

products.name: Adidas Samba OG
products.description: An iconic terrace classic with a premium leather upper, suede toe, and signature gum outsole. Built for style, loved for comfort.

products.name: Adidas Gazelle
products.description: A timeless suede icon with a low-profile silhouette and a comfortable rubber outsole. Easy to style, built to last.

products.name: Puma Suede Classic
products.description: Legendary Puma Suede styling with a soft suede upper and a grippy rubber outsole. A streetwear staple for decades.

products.name: Reebok Club C 85
products.description: Minimal, clean, and classic. Soft leather upper with a cushioned midsole for a comfortable, everyday fit.

products.name: ASICS GEL-Kayano 30
products.description: Stability-focused running shoe with premium cushioning and a supportive fit. Smooth transitions and comfort for long runs.

products.name: Nike Air Max 90
products.description: A true icon featuring the signature Waffle outsole, stitched overlays, and Max Air cushioning for a smooth, statement-making ride.

products.name: New Balance 530
products.description: Retro runner vibes with modern comfort. Breathable mesh upper and responsive cushioning for easy everyday wear.

products.name: Timberland 6-Inch Premium Boot
products.description: Water-resistant leather, durable build, and iconic styling. A cold-weather essential with rugged traction.

products.name: Clarks Desert Boot
products.description: Classic suede chukka boot with a crepe sole. Clean lines, comfort-first construction, and versatile styling.

products.name: Cole Haan GrandPrøs Oxford
products.description: A lightweight formal-casual hybrid with a sleek profile and cushioned sole. Designed for all-day office-to-evening comfort.

products.name: Birkenstock Arizona Essentials
products.description: Two-strap comfort sandal with a contoured footbed feel and lightweight build. Easy everyday wear with a clean look.

setup_instructions: 2. Update server/.env with your database URI
3. Run 'npm run install-all' to install dependencies
4. Run 'npm run dev' to start development servers
